section.11: The Book of the Commencement of the Prayer

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Musa bin Umair Al-Anbari and Qais bin Sulaim Al-Anbari said:"Alqamah bin Wa'il told us that his father said: "I saw the Messenger of Allah (ï·º), when he was standing in prayer, holding his left hand with his right
